reviews.review_msg: Useless is right, someone said arrogant and I think that is kind, thinks he is MR CRIM - he's NOT! Take anything else, if Brockman or Davies are teaching take a course with them!!!

Honestly the nicest prof ever! Super helpful, open to opinions on literature, and very approachable. Extremely lenient on crim students who do not have English Lit backgrounds. Made me love Dostoevsky! Would take him a class with him again in a heartbeat

Apart from his extremely sooth-me-to-sleep voice, he's a relatively good prof. Basically creates a great group discussion, but he does require that everyone talk at some point or another, but no embarrasing pointing fingers if you didn't do the reading. Highly recommended.
